<h1>Transcript: Joe is First Car</h1><p>Joe is 18 years old.</p><p>Joe works at McDonald is.</p><p>Joe saves all his money.</p><p>Joe has $2500.00 in the bank.</p><p>He wants to buy a sports car.</p><p>Joe starts to look for a new car.</p><p>Joe looks in the newspaper.</p><p>Joe looks in magazines.</p><p>Joe finds a car he likes.</p><p>Joe goes to see the car with his dad.</p><p>He really likes it.</p><p>Joe does not have enough money.</p><p>Joe is dad tells him to keep saving his money.</p><p>Joe wants this car a lot.</p><p>Joe asks his dad to help him.</p><p>Joe and his dad make a deal.</p><p>Joe is dad will lend him the money.</p><p>Joe must work hard.</p><p>He must pay the money back to his dad.</p><p>Joe is very happy.</p><p>Joe owns his first car.</p>
